story.text: There are two parts to Custom Elements: autonomous custom elements and customized built-in elements.

Autonomous custom elements are [[HTML]] elements that are entirely separated from native [[HTML]] elements, they are essentially built from the bottom up using the Custom Elements API ([[Application programming interface]]).
Customized built-in elements are elements that are built upon native HTML elements to reuse their functionality - [https://www.w3.org/TR/custom-elements/ w3.org]

Customized built-in elements are elements that are built upon native HTML elements to reuse their functionality.[https://www.w3.org/TR/custom-elements/ Custom Elements]
